name: ARUNODAYA SHIKHAN SAMITI
briefDescription: In amidst 2002 a small team of development workers who earlier associated with a local NGO came together under the leadership of Mr.Hemshankar Jethmal to search the possibilities to oppose the socio-economic and cultural operation and abuse, and to make participatory people for development the need for institutionalization of this voluntary action help to the ASS. Since 2003 different institutions have been funding ASS to carry out projects which are of real use to the people staying in whole of Chhattisgarh
